name: Answer To Survive
description:
Immerse yourself in an exciting experience of questions and mini-games, inspired by classic television quiz games, but with a unique twist!

Skully is the host of the most famous show in the afterlife and has prepared an endless array of questions for you. In Answer to Survive, you embody Bryan, a highly talented young dancer who hasn't been himself lately. After being selected to participate in the show, Bryan must overcome its three-week duration and answer 15 questions correctly in each of them. If you happen to make a mistake, a lifeline will be automatically activated, but they are not what they seem. These lifelines are platform mini-games that you'll have to pass to continue participating in the show. If you win, you survive, but if you lose, you'll become part of the program's audience for eternity. Will Bryan survive to tell the tale and take a lesson home?



Answer to Survive is a unique little game that combines a question-based game with platforming elements in an interactive way, making it enjoyable and replayable due to the variety of questions, platforms, and difficulty levels.

Features:

2 playable characters
4 difficulty levels (that are progressively unlocked)
9+ platforming levels
1000+ interesting questions
9 question categories (sports, science, animation, movies, series, music, general knowledge, art, and video games) with completely random appearance
Extra modes to keep the fun going
A charismatic host
Multilanguage support for practicing other languages
An important message at the end of the game
